alert.note: Alert for Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 10 at 2:33AM MDT until April 13 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are expected. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches possible. * WHERE...Southeast Johnson County. * WHEN...The Winter Weather Advisory remains in effect until 6 PM. The Winter Storm Watch is in effect from late Monday night through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult including along Interstate 25. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility in heavy snow could be reduced to a quarter mile or less.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
